title: Answer calls on your Pixel without saying anything using Live Captions – here’s how
content:
Did you know that you can carry on a phone conversation without saying anything into your phone? Well, you do now. Here’s how it works with Live Caption for calls on the Google Pixel.

more…

The post Answer calls on your Pixel without saying anything using Live Captions – here’s how appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Did you know you could type your response out in a phone call? It's called Live Caption for calls on the Pixel.
